name: The Journey (itch) (André Servidoni)
description:
Welcome to The Journey!

The year is 2800, the humanity have left the Earth to flee from several climate disasters. After 700 years, Earth is recovering, but the human past is still visible when on the surface. 
You are a volunteer that joined a CleanEarth corporation with a goal to clean the planet. Collect the most numbers of Items to be the leader of the high scores and put the humanity one step further to go back to the planet.

To aid you during your journey, the CleanEarth corporation developed a shot that can rewind you back to the beginning of your run. But be AWARE, you have only one bullet of the shot, so it is up to you to decide when to use it

Feel free to download or play it in the browser, hope you enjoy :D

Controls

The game is basically an endless runner and you control the character with the mouse. 

- Jump with Left click - To collect the items and avoid obstacles and traps.

- Rewind with Right click - Character will move to the beginning with the same score for a second run.

- For pause, just hit Esc

Assets:

- Font by Monkopus - https://monkopus.itch.io/stacked-pixel

- Level Art by edermunizz - https://edermunizz.itch.io/infinite-runner 

- Planet Art by helianthus games - https://helianthus-games.itch.io/

- Items Arts by pixeltiers - https://pixeltier.itch.io/pixeltiers-modern-rpg-icon-set

The journey was developed for the ScoreSpace Jam #15, with theme "One Bullet"

Engine: Unity

Status: Released

Release date: 20th September 2021
